403.title: Access Forbidden
403.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this resource.
403.description: The page or resource you're trying to access requires special permissions. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
404.description: It looks like the page you were trying to reach doesn't exist. This could be due to a broken link or the page may have been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.subtitle: Something went wrong on our end.
500.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working to fix the issue. Please try again later.

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.subtitle: Please check your internet connection.
offline.description: It looks like you're not connected to the internet. Please check your connection and try again.

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: We'll be back shortly.
maintenance.description: App-Oint is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance. We'll be back online soon. Thank you for your patience.
